mapper.sql: VARIABLE_GROUP_ID, VARIABLE_GROUP_NAME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_PERSON, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select:
select VARIABLE_GROUP_ID as "variableGroupId", VARIABLE_GROUP_NAME as "variableGroupName", CREATE_DATE as "createDate", UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate" from CRE_PUB_VARIABLE_GROUP where 1=1
AND VARIABLE_GROUP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{variableGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND VARIABLE_GROUP_ID like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{variableGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
SELECT count(1) from CRE_PUB_VARIABLE_GROUP WHERE VARIABLE_GROUP_ID = #{variableGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT count(1) from CRE_VARIABLE WHERE VARIABLE_GROUP_ID = #{variableGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM CRE_PUB_VARIABLE_GROUP WHERE VARIABLE_GROUP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{variableGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT VARIABLE_GROUP_ID, VARIABLE_GROUP_NAME FROM CRE_PUB_VARIABLE_GROUP ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into CRE_PUB_VARIABLE_GROUP
VARIABLE_GROUP_ID,
VARIABLE_GROUP_NAME,
CREATE_PERSON,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_PERSON,
UPDATE_DATE,
#{variableGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{variableGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update CRE_PUB_VARIABLE_GROUP
VARIABLE_GROUP_NAME = #{variableGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where VARIABLE_GROUP_ID = #{variableGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
